titleStmt.title: His Majesties speech to the gentlemen at Yorke on Thursday last, being the 12. of May, 1642.
Speeches. 1642-05-12.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Yorke, and now reprinted at London,

notesStmt.note: Originally published as His Majesties speech to the gentry of the county of Yorke.
Reproduction of the original in the Caius and Gonville College Library (Cambridge University).
